game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the mysterious island.
game.description: In this quest, you embark on an adventure to search for the lost treasure of a legendary pirate. You have received a map containing clues that will lead you to the treasure's location. Journey across the treacherous sea to a remote island and unravel the secrets that lie within.
game.reward: A chest full of gold coins and precious gems.

task.description: Locate the hidden cave entrance on the eastern side of the island. Inside, you will find the Skeleton Key that is required to unlock the treasure chamber.
